ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .sf ` W ) = ( .sf ` W ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` W ) = ( TopOpen ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) = ( TopOpen ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_istlm | |- ( W e. TopMod <-> ( ( W e. TopMnd /\ W e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` W ) e. TopRing ) /\ ( .sf ` W ) e. ( ( ( TopOpen ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) tX ( TopOpen ` W ) ) Cn ( TopOpen ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simplbi | |- ( W e. TopMod -> ( W e. TopMnd /\ W e. LMod /\ ( Scalar ` W ) e. TopRing ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simp1d | |- ( W e. TopMod -> W e. TopMnd ) |
